mapper.select: select ec.id, ec.exam_id, te.exam_name, ec.classes_id, tc.classes_name,tc.creator_id, release_date, start_date, deadline, te.topic_num, te.total_score, ug.grade, te.pass_mark, publish_answer, publish_score, status, ug.exam_status,te.time from exam_classes ec left join t_exam te on te.exam_id = ec.exam_id left join t_classes tc on ec.classes_id = tc.classes_id left join user_grade ug on ec.classes_id = ug.classes_id and ec.exam_id = ug.exam_id and ug.user_id = #{userId} where ec.classes_id = #{classesId}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_classes(exam_id, classes_id, release_date, start_date, deadline, publish_answer, publish_score) values (#{examId}, #{classesId}, #{releaseDate}, #{startDate}, #{deadline}, #{publishAnswer}, #{publishScore})
mapper.update:
update exam_classes
release_date = #{releaseDate},
start_date = #{startDate},
deadline = #{deadline},
publish_answer = #{publishAnswer},
publish_score = #{publishScore},
where classes_id = #{classesId} and exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.delete: delete from exam_classes where classes_id = #{classesId} and exam_id = #{examId}
